name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anthropos, new skills with AI Job Simulations

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your career and learn new skills using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Look at your career with skills and prepare for new roles or jobs!
Anthropos redefines career management by offering you a comprehensive suite of tools to map, track, and advance your skills. With Anthropos, you can quickly import your profile and utilize our Chrome extension to not only autofill job applications and create personalized cover letters but also to engage deeply with a wide array of learning and testing opportunities available through our content library.

Elevate your career preparation with our AI-driven Job Simulations, where you can test your skills in realistic work scenarios, learn new competencies, and practice for interviews with virtual simulations. These interactive experiences are designed to identify areas for growth and build your confidence for real-world challenges.

Discover our Skill Paths, which are carefully designed learning tracks aimed at equipping you with the knowledge for various job roles. From tech and sales to marketing and soft skills, Anthropos continuously expands its educational offerings to keep you current and competitive in the job market.

Getting started is simpleâ€”import your data from LinkedIn or upload your CV. On job application pages, the Anthropos widget enables you to effortlessly populate application fields and respond to complex questions like "Why do you want to work for company X?" Customize or generate cover letters tailored to specific job applications directly through our platform.

Anthropos is your partner in proactive career management. Track all your application activities, from initial drafts to final submissions, directly within our interface, keeping you organized and focused on your career progression.

Our free tier includes everything to get you started and our Premium Plan gives access to all our content and features.

For feedback, support, or inquiries, contact us at info@anthropos.work. We're committed to enhancing your career journey.
